value.title: Power BI Admins Gain My Workspace Access
value.excerpt: During this video, we will check how Power BI Admins can get User's My Workspace Access. Power BI provides secure storage for user data in their "My Workspaces". value.title: Power BI: Dynamic Format String for Measures
value.excerpt: Recently Microsoft launched new Power BI feature - "Dynamic Format String for Measures". With dynamic format strings for measures, you can determine how measures appear in visuals by conditionally applying a format string with a separate DAX expression.  Dynamic format strings overcome an inherent disadvantage

value.excerpt: In this vlog we will learn about how we can hide the Filter Pane from the published version of the Power BI report. value.title: Power BI Tip - Stop Visual Interactions at Report Level in Power BI

value.title: Are you backing up your Power BI Dataset???
value.excerpt: While Power BI is a SaaS service, backing up your dataset is still important. What if something was accidently deleted? How do you recover it? Patrick shows you how you can get a backup / restore process in place so you can sleep at night.  Backup/Restore PowerShell Script: https://guyinacu.be/backuprestorescript
